-1.title: Episode dated 30 April 2018
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Black Swamp Baseball Card Find
1.plot: The series about unconventional inheritances open with the story of cousins who found hundreds of uncirculated 1909 baseball cards in the attic of their great-grandfather's house, which they'd inherited.

2.title: The Hoarder and the Actors
2.plot: Two obscure actors inherit a million-dollar Illinois farm from a fan they're never met.

3.title: 3000 Classic Cars
3.plot: A millionaire's children inherit 3000 classic cars.

4.title: 300-Year-Old Stradivarius
4.plot: A man leaves a 300-year-old Stradivarius cello to his daughters, with instructions to sell it to a young maestro. However, they may make more by selling it to the highest bidder.

5.title: $3 Million Nickel
5.plot: A man inherits what's said to be a counterfeit 1913 Liberty nickel.

6.title: Bonnie & Clyde
6.plot: A man inherits guns used by Bonnie and Clyde in their final shoot-out. He decides to auction them off, but learns that doing so may not be legal.

7.title: Youngest Winery Owner
7.plot: An 8-year-old boy inherits his father's wine-making business.

8.title: Bug Museum
8.plot: A family inherits a museum that features the world's largest private bug collection, which is worth millions.

9.title: Junk Yard Gems
9.plot: Grandchildren inherit a salvage yard, filled with hundreds of pre-1940s cars.

10.title: JFK Letters
10.plot: Letters from John F. Kennedy to the mother of a sailor killed on PT-109, which was rammed and sunk by a Japanese destroyer in 1943, are inherited.

11.title: Superstorm Comic Books
11.plot: A Jersey Shore family's hopes to rebuild their ice-cream shop, which was left in ruin by Hurricane Sandy, rest on the value of thousands of mint-condition comic books from the 1930s, 1940s and 1950s.

12.title: Roy Orbison's Lost Song
12.plot: Roy Orbison's sons discover a song, that their dad never released, on a homemade cassette.

13.title: Death Valley Thermometer
13.plot: A family inherits a landmark on the highway to Las Vegas: a decrepit 134-foot thermometer that's adjacent to a once-lucrative restaurant.

14.title: Civil War Tree Stump
14.plot: A woman inherits her dad's collection of Civil War artifacts, which include a bullet-riddled tree stump from one of the war's bloodiest battles.

15.title: Pickett's Charge
15.plot: The story of the great-great grandson of Confederate Gen. George Pickett, who was swindled out of his inheritance of Civil War artifacts.

16.title: The Mogul and the Artist
16.plot: A real-estate developer's children discover that the furniture, he used in model homes, was made by a world-renowned craftsman.

17.title: Movie Theater
17.plot: A young woman inherits her grandfather's struggling movie theater, and his final wish for her to find a way to keep it open.

18.title: Texas Map
18.plot: A map inherits a map of Texas, that turns out to have valuable historical significance.

19.title: Dino Cowboy
19.plot: A Montana cowboy inherits a ranch with a hidden fortune.

20.title: Lions, Tigers and Bears
20.plot: A Florida woman inherits a struggling wildlife sanctuary from her husband.

21.title: Tractors Galore
21.plot: A farmer leaves his family with a large collection of tractors, after his death.

22.title: Custer's Last Stand
22.plot: A woman inherits 72 portraits of American Indians who took part in the Battle of the Little Big Horn, including one of the man who claimed to have killed Gen. Custer.

23.title: Gatorama
23.plot: Children fight for control of their roadside-attraction inheritance: an alligator and crocodile ranch.

24.title: Doll Boy
24.plot: A doll collection that includes 500 never-opened, vintage Barbie dolls, is inherited.

25.title: The Ride of Their Lives
25.plot: A century-old amusement park is inherited.

26.title: Masters of Taxidermy
26.plot: A taxidermist leaves his sons his business, hundreds of stuffed beasts and some Hollywood props.

27.title: Over the Moon
27.plot: A woman inherits a valuable space collection from her soul mate, as well as a romantic surprise.

1.title: Tanks a Lot
1.plot: A millionaire leaves his kids a fleet of 240 military vehicles.

2.title: Signed, Shoeless Joe
2.plot: A widow hopes to prove that the signed photo, of baseball legend Shoeless Joe Jackson, she inherited is the real deal.

3.title: Ghost Town Gold Mine
3.plot: A Nevada prospector's wife leaves a man an old gold mine, but the bequeath digs up trouble, when he's sued by her niece.

4.title: Washington's Wallet
4.plot: An unlikely family passes George Washington's wallet down through the generations.

5.title: Autograph Hound
5.plot: A prolific autograph hunter leaves his collection to a surprised heir.

6.title: Double Barrel Texas Tale
6.plot: A frontier fort and antique guns are inherited.

7.title: From the Emperor's Desk
7.plot: A lawyer receives exotic artwork from a mysterious client.

8.title: Treasure Hunter
8.plot: A treasure hunter's children inherit a 17th-century Spanish wreck.

9.title: Dad's Home
9.plot: A second-generation architect inherits an aging, landmark house designed by his famous father and must decide whether to fix it up or tear it down.

10.title: Holocaust Diary
10.plot: A holocaust survivor's secret diary spurs his daughter to search for his art collection, which was looted by the Nazis.

11.title: Toy Soldier Fortune
11.plot: A Wall Street broker leaves, to his children, his collection of antique toy soldiers, worth hundreds of thousands of dollars - and a difficult mission.

12.title: Teeth That Won WWII
12.plot: Dentures, designed for Winston Churchill, are inherited by a dental technician's son.

13.title: Redwood on Wheels
13.plot: A woman inherits a log cabin from her grandfather.

14.title: Orphan Cars
14.plot: A collection of automobiles, made by companies that no longer exist, is inherited.

15.title: Piece of the White House
15.plot: A chunk of carved wood in a basement turns out to be a valuable architectural treasure from the early days of Washington, D.C.

16.title: Oswald's Gravestone
16.plot: A family inherits the tombstone of Lee Harvey Oswald.

17.title: Hollywood Dog Fight
17.plot: A co-creator of The Simpsons (1989) leaves his dog to its trainer; a woman leaves her house to her parrot.

19.title: Oldest Baseball Card
19.plot: The great-grandniece of 1860 centerfielder Archibald McMahon inherits his pre-Civil War baseball card.

20.title: John Brown's Shackles
20.plot: A man inherits shackles worn by anti-slavery crusader John Brown, as he mounted the gallows.

21.title: Father of New York
21.plot: Heirs to a woman's condo discover historical documents, worth some $700,000.

22.title: Junkyard Princess
22.plot: A woman transforms her father's wrecking company into an upscale home-restoration business.

23.title: Little House, Big Mall
23.plot: An unlikely heir inherits a house that the owner had refused to sell to a developer, who then built a shopping mall around it.

24.title: Picture This!
24.plot: Priceless photographic prints, made by early photographic masters, are discovered by heirs in boxes in their mother's attic.

1.title: Lincoln Rail Splitter
1.plot: A log-splitting mallet, believed to have belonged to a young Abraham Lincoln, is passed down through generations of an Indianapolis family.

2.title: Fantasy Feud
2.plot: Conan the Barbarian illustrator Frank Frazetta leaves art, worth millions of dollars, that sparks a family feud.

3.title: Pretty Penny
3.plot: A U.S. Mint worker bequeaths a bag of change to his son, which includes a one-of-a-kind aluminum penny that rocks the coin-collecting world.

4.title: Bead Dazzled
4.plot: A Pam Am stewardess, from the airline's golden age, leaves her niece a valuable collection of ancient beads she gathered in her travels.

5.title: Basketball's Magna Carta
5.plot: Descendants of James Naismith inherit the two pages, upon which he first typed up the rules of basketball.

6.title: Dino Park
6.plot: Family members ponder what to do with a 1950s "Jurassic Park", the family patriarch built in Oregon.

7.title: Hatchet Man
7.plot: A world-class blade maker (and one-time Unabomber suspect) leaves his brother thousands of hatchets, axes, swords and knives.

8.title: Missing Masterpiece
8.plot: The great-great-grandson of a legendary Texas painter discovers a long-forgotten mural in the rafters of the family's attic.

9.title: Ancient Cliff Paintings
9.plot: A rancher discovers she has inherited one of the world's largest sites of ancient Indian rock drawings.

10.title: Autograph Addicts
10.plot: David Kuflik inherits a collection of 80,000 autographs that his obsessive father, Harvey Kuflik, and aunt, Rhoda Kuflik, had collected since they were children.

11.title: Jane Austen's Ring
11.plot: Jane Austen's five-times great-grandniece auctions off the legendary romantic writer's ring to American pop star Kelly Clarkson.

12.title: Civil War Model Ships
12.plot: A Louisiana man inherits an armada of scale-model warships his father painstakingly built from original blueprints.

13.title: Puppet Opera
13.plot: Brothers inherit their boss's (William B. Fosser) 60-year-old puppet opera, a Chicago institution, and agree to destroy it if the opera goes out of business.

14.title: Toy Soldier Story 2
14.plot: A grieving widow watches a previous Strange Inheritance (2015) toy soldier episode, then invites Jamie to assess her late husband's huge collection.

15.title: Nazi Looted Art
15.plot: Shocked brothers learn they are heirs to an art fortune, stolen by Adolf Hitler during World War II, and vow to get it back.

16.title: Gorillas in Their Midst
16.plot: An old vaudeville performer in a traveling chimp act leaves her granddaughter dozens of captive primates.

17.title: Beauty and the Babes
17.plot: Lynda Bannister, the daughter of Constance Bannister, a world-famous baby photographer, inherits 100,000 dazzling portraits from the 40s, 50s and 60s.

18.title: Industrial Scale Hoarder
18.plot: A cell tower mogul hoards three million pounds of scrap, leaving his heirs to deal with a forty-acre heap.

19.title: Library of Magic
19.plot: A father leaves his son stacks of ancient magic texts, some containing secrets magicians have guarded for centuries.

20.title: Million Dollar Beggar
20.plot: A homeless man dies mysteriously and leaves his cousins several storage units with contents reportedly worth $1 million.

21.title: Celebrity Art
21.plot: A Pennsylvania man, Hugh Hooper, inherits hundreds of paintings by celebrities, from Ringo Starr and Bob Dylan to John Gotti and Adolf Hitler, from his younger brother Hoop (Stephen Hooper).

22.title: Century-Old Blue Jeans
22.plot: A pioneer's descendants inherits his never-worn 1893 Levis, called a denim collector's "Holy Grail".

23.title: Roller Derby Queen
23.plot: A life-long roller derby fan inherits a massive stash of memorabilia from one of the sport's legendary skaters, Ann Calvello.

24.title: Desert Treasure
24.plot: A man, cleaning out his basement, finds a forgotten masterpiece left behind by a distant uncle.

25.title: Jesse James & His Killer
25.plot: High-tech forensics suggest a family heirloom is the only photo of the outlaw, Jesse James, with the man who killed him.

26.title: Eight Tons of Art
26.plot: A renowned tile artist (Bill Wagner) leaves his sons (Ron Wagner and Norm Wagner) 160 autobiographical murals, weighing 16 thousand pounds.

27.title: Winging It
27.plot: Children inherit a massive B-17 bomber their father bought after WWII, flew to Oregon and placed atop his 48-pump gas station.

28.title: First Fashion Cop
28.plot: Fashion designer Richard Selzer (Mr. Blackwell), famous for his best- and worst-dressed lists, leaves B Harlan Boll, his agent, a rack of gowns he created for Hollywood's biggest stars.

1.title: Lost Rembrandt
1.plot: After their mother dies, her sons discover that the painting from their New Jersey dining room is a long-lost Rembrandt.

2.title: Nat Turner's Bible
2.plot: A Virginia family passes down thru the generations the bible Nat Turner carried on his bloody 1832 slave rebellion.

3.title: Our Town
3.plot: Siblings inherit an entire company town in Pennsylvania.

4.title: Cannon Father
4.plot: Oregon brothers inherit from their gunsmith father a massive collection of historic military weapons, dating back to the Revolutionary War.

5.title: Indian Arrowheads
5.plot: A North Carolina man inherits 250,000 ancient Indian arrowheads.

6.title: Houdini Jewel
6.plot: A magician's wife inherits a jewel-encrusted pin said to have been bestowed on Harry Houdini by Czar Nicholas II.

7.title: Vet's Corvette
7.plot: A Vietnam vet leaves his son a mint-condition 1967 Stingray he obtained, upon returning from combat.

8.title: Overdressed
8.plot: A woman's life changes, when she inherits, from her godmother, 70 boxes of museum-worthy historic dresses.

9.title: Bang for the Buck
9.plot: Daughter inherits her father's million-dollar cache of Colt revolvers from the Old West, including a rare 1876 Buntline Special.

10.title: Gong Show
10.plot: New York woman inherits a priceless set of cymbals that famed Italian composer Giacomo Puccini had custom-made for his final opera.

11.title: Million Dollar Train Set
11.plot: Texas man leaves his family a massive model railway that he spent $1 million to build.

12.title: Mob Files
12.plot: Nephew inherits boxes of original IRS documents revealing his uncle was an undercover agent, who helped take down Al Capone and solve the Lindbergh baby kidnapping.

13.title: Bumper Crop
13.plot: An Idaho farmer meticulously restores classic cars in his barn, and leaves them to his children.

14.title: Making Faces
14.plot: An artist's daughter inherits hundreds of priceless hand-made masks of famous figures from the 1930's and 1940's.

15.title: Man Cave
15.plot: Heirs feud over 20 acres of elaborate tunnels, rooms and gardens dug by hand by their uncle, who emigrated from Sicily in 1906.

16.title: Crime Ring
16.plot: Legendary Texas sheriff leaves his heirs Bonnie Parker's ring, recovered after his shootout with the Bonnie and Clyde gang.

17.title: Screen Gems
17.plot: Family inherits 200,000 pieces of jewelry worn in classic Hollywood movies.

18.title: Gilded Age Money Pit
18.plot: Retired school teacher inherits a French Chateau, that has been moved to New Jersey, and filled with 19th-century furnishings from a Vanderbilt mansion.

19.title: Little Big Top
19.plot: A woman finds a surprising home for her father-in-law's hand-carved 60,000-piece miniature circus, which had toured the world in the 1930's.

20.title: World's My Oyster
20.plot: Cousins inherit oyster beds farmed by their family for a century, and are inspired to revive the dormant business.

21.title: Speed King
21.plot: Drag-racing champion leaves his son the car he designed to set the world's speed record;

22.title: Lunar Bibles
22.plot: Son of NASA chaplain inherits more than a hundred bibles that went to the moon;

23.title: Norman Rockwell Shocker
23.plot: After their father dies, his sons discover a fake wall in his home that's hiding a Norman Rockwell painting worth millions.

24.title: Freaky Forest
24.plot: California man inherits a natural wonder theme park, filled with bizarre trees, including 12 growing from a single trunk.

25.title: Ma Barker Hideout
25.plot: A Florida man inherits the house, where FBI agents gunned down Ma Barker and her son in the longest shootout in FBI history.

26.title: Astrodome Rail Car
26.plot: A Houston man inherits a luxury train car, custom-made for the legendary politician behind the world's first indoor stadium.

1.title: 300-Year-Old Stradivarius - Unpacked
1.plot: The series, which offers a behind-the-scenes peek at "Strange Inheritance" stories, begins with the episode about a 300-year-old Stradivarius cello that a man left to his daughters.

2.title: 3000 Classic Cars - Unpacked
2.plot: A millionaire's children inherit 3000 classic cars.

3.title: Bonnie & Clyde - Unpacked
3.plot: A man inherit guns used by Bonnie and Clyde in their final shoot-out. He decides to auction them off, but learns that doing so may not be legal.

4.title: Black Swamp Baseball Card Find - Unpacked
4.plot: Cousins find hundreds of uncirculated 1909 baseball cards in the attic of their great-grandfather's house, which they'd inherited.

5.title: $3 Million Nickel - Unpacked
5.plot: A man inherits what's said to be a counterfeit 1913 Liberty nickel.

6.title: The Hoarder and the Actors - Unpacked
6.plot: Two obscured actors (Peter Barton and Kevin Brophy) inherit a million-dollar Illinois farm, from a fan they've never met.

7.title: Death Valley Thermometer - Unpacked
7.plot: A family inherits a landmark on the highway to Las Vegas: a decrepit 134-foot thermometer that's adjacent to a once-lucrative restaurant.

imdb.plot outline: Love, loss, and a legacy left behind. "Strange Inheritance" is a ground-breaking new reality program from the Fox Business Network. From multi-million dollar treasures, to truly bizarre collections and one-of-a- kind artifacts, this series tells the stories of how families decide what to do with their newly acquired possessions. Shocking secrets are discovered, gut-wrenching decisions are made about priceless heirlooms and fascinating histories are uncovered along the way.
imdb.title: Strange Inheritance
plot: Love, loss, and a legacy left behind. "_Strange Inheritance_ (qv)" is a ground-breaking new reality program from the Fox Business Network. From multi-million dollar treasures, to truly bizarre collections and one-of-a- kind artifacts, this series tells the stories of how families decide what to do with their newly acquired possessions. Shocking secrets are discovered, gut-wrenching decisions are made about priceless heirlooms and fascinating histories are uncovered along the way.::FBN
